metadata.title: CVE-2020-5991 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: NVIDIA CUDA Toolkit, all versions prior to 11.1.1, contains a vulnerability in the NVJPEG library in which an out-of-bounds read or write operation may lead to code execution, denial of service, or information disclosure.

criterions.comment: nvidia-cuda-toolkit package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
